title: Update Customer Contract Pricing
description: A new annual contract has been signed with a major customer, requiring an update to their special pricing for several products.

tasks.description: Retrieve the customer's current pricing agreement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pulls up the existing price list for the customer.

tasks.description: Enter the new, lower prices for the three products covered by the new contract.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the prices for the specified products.

tasks.description: Set the effective date for the new pricing to the start of the next month.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly configures the start date for the new price list.
